description: This file defines API endpoints related to organization branding, including getting and updating branding settings such as logo URL, colors, and organization display name. It is part of a FastAPI application and uses SQLAlchemy for database interactions, with role-based access control for certain operations.

classes.name: BrandingSettings
classes.description: Schema/model representing branding settings, including organization name, logo URL, colors, and subdomain.

methods.name: get_branding( org_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve branding settings for an organization identified by org_id.

methods.name: update_branding( org_id: int, branding: BrandingSettings, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update branding settings for an organization, restricted to admin roles.

ctags.name: get_branding
ctags.signature: ( org_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: update_branding
ctags.signature: ( org_id: int, branding: BrandingSettings, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
